text: Christopher Haden-Guest, 5th Baron Haden-Guest (born February 5, 1948), usually simply known as Christopher Guest, is an English-American actor, comedian, director, musician, and screenwriter. He is known for his work in This Is Spinal Tap, The Princess Bride, Best in Show, A Mighty Wind, and in For Your Consideration. He has won an Emmy Award. ==Early life== Guest was born on February 5, 1948 in New York City, New York. He studied at The High School of Music & Art and at New York University. ==Marriage and family== Guest married Jamie Lee Curtis in 1984.
